meanings.definition: The quality or state of being morally upright and honest.
meanings.sent1: Her upstandingnesses shone through when she returned the lost wallet to its owner.
meanings.sent2: His upstandingnesses in the community earned him the respect of his peers.
meanings.sent3: The detective's upstandingnesses made him the most trustworthy person to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: The upstandingnesses of the lighthouse guided ships safely through the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's upstandingnesses inspired her students to always do the right thing.

meanings.definition: The act of standing up for what is right and just.
meanings.sent1: The protest was a powerful display of upstandingnesses against injustice.
meanings.sent2: His upstandingnesses was evident when he spoke out against corruption in the government.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's upstandingnesses led him to fight crime and protect the city.
meanings.sent4: Her upstandingnesses was like a beacon of light in a world filled with darkness.
meanings.sent5: The upstandingnesses of the jury ensured a fair trial for all involved.
